org.gsma.joyn.ft

Class FileTransferService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gsma.joyn.JoynService
      • org.gsma.joyn.ft.FileTransferService

  • public class FileTransferService
extends JoynService
    This class offers the main entry point to transfer files and to receive files. Several applications may connect/disconnect to the API. The parameter contact in the API supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI.
    Author:
    Jean-Marc AUFFRET

      • transferFile

        public FileTransfer transferFile(java.lang.String contact,
                        java.lang.String filename,
                        FileTransferListener listener)
                          throws JoynServiceException,
                                 JoynContactFormatException
        Transfers a file to a contact. The parameter filename contains the complete path of the file to be transferred. The parameter contact supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI. If the format of the contact is not supported an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        contact -
        filename - Filename to transfer
        listener - File transfer event listener
        Returns:
        File transfer
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException

      • transferFile

        public FileTransfer transferFile(java.lang.String contact,
                        java.lang.String filename,
                        java.lang.String fileicon,
                        FileTransferListener listener)
                          throws JoynServiceException,
                                 JoynContactFormatException
        Transfers a file to a contact. The parameter filename contains the complete path of the file to be transferred. The parameter contact supports the following formats: MSISDN in national or international format, SIP address, SIP-URI or Tel-URI. If the format of the contact is not supported an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        contact -
        filename - Filename to transfer
        fileicon - Filename of the file icon associated to the file to be transfered
        listener - File transfer event listener
        Returns:
        File transfer
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
        JoynContactFormatException
